newsitem.title: USA: Nu Skin sees 1997 charges from incentives.
newsitem.headline: Nu Skin sees 1997 charges from incentives.

text.p: Nu Skin Asia Pacific Inc, reporting higher 1996 fourth quarter results, said Wednesday it expects charges in 1997 of about $18 million for non-cash and non-recurring expenses associated with its planned distributor equity incentive program.
The company said it hopes to increase distributor productivity through a global program that will give distributors options to purchase 1.6 million shares of the company's Class A common stock.
The number of options each distributor receives will be based on this performance and productivity through August 31, 1997, the company said.
The options are exercisable at $5.75 per share and will vest on December 31, 1997.
